alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Helena and northeastern East Feliciana Parishes, southeastern Wilkinson and southwestern Amite Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norwood to 6 miles southwest of Darlington. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Centreville, Wilson, Norwood, Felps, Darlington and Easleyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
